title: The 5 Best Romantic Destinations for Newlyweds Proximate to Delhi
text:
The 5 Best Romantic Destinations for Newlyweds Proximate to Delhi The 5 Best Romantic Destinations for Newlyweds Proximate to Delhi 
Newlywed couples should take time off together to re-kindle their relationship. A weekend of romance is just the respite you need after a hectic work week. 
For romantic weekend breaks from Delhi, here is what you can choose from: Almora 
Situated in the beautiful state of Uttarakhand and nestled between the vast Himalayan range, the horse-shaped hill station is perfect for a weekend of bliss. It is a sightseeing paradise which will appeal to you. The areas from Almora to Mukteshwar as well as Kausani are best viewed during sunrise and sunset. You and your wife can take an evening stroll through the market to feel the buzz of the place.You will surely enjoy the time spent with your wife. Auli 
The place is known for its apple orchards, deodars and oak trees. The hill station is home to a variety of flowers which come alive during the winter months. The best time to visit Auli is in February. The winter chill still lingers in the air and the sun feels great against your skin. It takes only a few hours to reach the destination. Kasauli 
Kausali is a quaint hill station nestled between Chandigarh and Shimla. If you are looking for a peaceful, romantic weekend, this is the place for you. The lush green hills and cool weather plays perfectly to the mood of the place. Taking a walk along the rows of cedar trees is a great way for couples to bond. If a weekend is not enough, you can always choose to come back here for a longer duration. Khajjar 
Khajjar is touted as the 'mini-Switzerland of India' and is located proximate to Dalhousie. You will enjoy the beautiful scenery. The entire area seems like out of a fairy-tale. It has a perfect blend of lakes, forests and pastures. Adventure junkies can also enjoy the thrill of paragliding, trekking and zorbing. You can also stick to playing golf if you enjoy it. You and your spouse can lie down on the rolling hills and enjoy a few peaceful moments together. Narkanda 
Located in Himachal Pradesh, Narkana is a must visit for couples who want a romantic weekend break from Delhi. The entire area is surrounded by forests and woodlands. This quaint town is also known for skiing in winters and is perfect for couples who enjoy the thrill of the sport. You and your spouse can also take a boat ride or go trekking. The apple orchards found in the area are beautiful, too. 
These romantic getaways are just a drive from Delhi. In the mood for love? Take your lady love on a small vacation. Saurav Mishra is the author of this article on Tripoto about the best weekend getaways from Delhi . The travel website caters to couples who want to take a vacation to romantic destinations worldwide. Connect with other married couples to figure out which place could be best suited for you.
